name: PDFResampleType

properties.description: Averages the pixels in a sample area and replaces the entire area with the average pixel color at the specified resolution.
properties.name: PDFAVERAGE

properties.description: Chooses a pixel in the center of the sample area and replaces the entire area with that pixel color; significantly reduces conversion time but results in images that are less smooth and continuous.
properties.name: PDFSUBSAMPLE

properties.description: Uses a weighted average to determine pixel color, which usually yields better results than the simple averaging method of downsampling. The slowest but most precise method, resulting in the smoothest gradations.
properties.name: PDFBICUBIC

description: Downsampling options when saving as PDF.
